original_text: Do not join with people who want to argue about silly things that do not mean anything. You know that silly things like that only cause people to quarrel.
korean_text: 어리석고 무식한 변론을 버리라 이에서 다툼이 나는 줄 앎이라

sentences.original_text: who want to argue about silly things
You know that silly things like that

sentences.korean_translation: 사람들로 하여금 다투게 할 뿐이라는 것을 압니다
